Address.label: Address
Address.value: UNIT D, 2/F,KINGDOM POWER COMMERCIAL BUILDING,32-36 DES VOEUX ROAD WEST, SHEUNG WAN, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Darkiris Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops, publishes, markets, and distributes mobile games on various platforms in Hong Kong, Taiwan, Southeast Asia, North America, and the Middle East. It engages in the game design, programming, and graphics activities. Additionally, it develops AI interactive experiences and cross-media content applications. The company offers its products through various third-party digital storefronts. Darkiris Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.
